metadata.description: Attributed to J.-M.-A. Servan. Cf. Barbier
Monglond, A. France révolutionnaire et impériale
Presents speeches by Rousseau and Mirabeau at a fictitious meeting of the Assemblée nationale
"Extrait de la séance de l'Assemblée nationale, du lundi 24 décembre 1789"--P. 1-13
"Suite des décrets de l'Assemblée nationale, concernant les comédiens."--P. 14-37
metadata.notes: Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained, marked and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
